alert.note: Alert for Northern Berkshire; Southern Berkshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 16 at 6:57PM EST until December 18 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 4 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Litchfield County. In Massachusetts, Berkshire County. In New York, Eastern Rensselaer, Eastern Columbia and Eastern Dutchess Counties. In Vermont, Bennington County. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 4 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
